cause.description:
Christians Teens Unite is an orgnization that is by teens for teens. we want to let teens all over the world that are christian know that we all can unite to praise gods word.
1. Some teens get persucuted for being christian around the world.
2. teens must stick together through any ordeal.
3. Christian teens must untie to help spread gods word.
cause.mission: spead gods word to all teens all over the world
cause.name: Christian Teens Unite
